topComments.author: Sarah Anderson

(Original) I got this shirt in july 2021 but the thunder Canyon was closed that day it sucked üòï  For some advice Get the fast lane plus pass you don't gotta wait in line i know it$$$ but definitely worth it because you enjoy your food and go to the bar and have a couple drinks get an elephant ear whatever.but waiting 3 hours is a waste of time.

topComments.author: Sky
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Para a emo√ß√£o do passeio em si, sem incluir os tempos de espera ou a opera√ß√£o, este passeio √© totalmente 5 estrelas. √â extremamente divertido, super emocionante e eu diria que a decolagem √© provavelmente a parte mais divertida de tudo. Eu estava t√£o nervoso para montar isso no come√ßo, mas fiquei muito feliz por ter feito isso. Definitivamente, eu recomendaria obter o passe r√°pido, al√©m disso, as linhas regulares s√£o super longas. E a √∫nica coisa que √© realmente uma droga no passeio em si √© que ele tende a quebrar muito.  (Original) For the thrill of the ride itself, not including wait times or the operation, this ride it‚Äôs completely 5 stars. It‚Äôs extremely fun, super thrilling and I would say the blast off is probably the most fun part of it. I was so nervous to ride this at first but I was so glad i did. I would definitely recommend getting the fast pass plus for it though, the regular lines are super long. And the only thing that really sucks about the ride itself is that it tends to break down a lot.

topComments.author: Holder Godwin
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Uma das experi√™ncias mais emocionantes do parque, da√≠ o nome, Top THRILL Dragster.  O passeio O Top THRILL Dragster tem cerca de 30 segundos de dura√ß√£o com, em m√©dia, um tempo de espera de uma hora ou vinte minutos com FL +. √â pura adrenalina e a acumula√ß√£o √© intensa. Este √© um ac√©falo se voc√™ visitar Cedar Point, especialmente se voc√™ tiver FL +.  Seguran√ßa Este passeio pode ser o mais seguro do parque, embora seja o mais alto. O passeio √© bastante confi√°vel, com a √∫nica vari√°vel real sendo o vento (e talvez o peso). As revers√µes √†s vezes acontecem, mas s√£o extremamente seguras e resultam em mais divers√£o, sendo esse outro lan√ßamento.  Conclus√£o Um passeio extremamente divertido que, embora tenha uma espera extremamente longa (normalmente), √© obrigat√≥rio para quem a visita.  Nota Os p√°ssaros ao redor do Top Thrill s√£o INSANOS. Eles constantemente passavam por perto e at√© encontravam h√≥spedes esperando pela carona. Foi hil√°rio.  (Original) One of the most thrilling experiencing in the park, hence the name, Top THRILL Dragster.  The Ride The Top THRILL Dragster is about 30 seconds long with, on average, a one hour wait time or twenty minutes with FL+. It is pure adrenaline and the build up is intense. This is a no-brainer to go on if you visit Cedar Point, especially if you have FL+.  Safety This ride might be the safest in the park, even though it's the tallest. The ride is fairly reliable, with the only real variable being wind (and maybe weight). Rollbacks sometime happen but they are extremely safe and result in more fun, that being another launch.  Conclusion An extremely fun ride that, although has an extremely long wait (usually), is a must for those visiting.  Side Note The birds around the Top Thrill are INSANE. They constantly zipped by and even ran into guests waiting for the ride. It was hilarious.

topComments.author: dakrrs
topComments.comment: (5/9/22) Shut down for the season.  Very disappointed since this was my most anticipated ride on our vacation.  With the accident that happened the previous year, I understand.  We will see what the future holds for this coaster.

topComments.author: BryceFourn 2001
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) A maior adrenalina na Roller Coast da Am√©rica ainda! Embora eu esteja feliz que a mulher envolvida no acidente esteja indo bem, eu s√≥ espero que a CP coloque o Dragster de volta em funcionamento no pr√≥ximo ano com algumas atualiza√ß√µes s√©rias no sistema de lan√ßamento, fila de espera e modifica√ß√µes na pista, porque simplesmente n√£o seria o mesmo sem ele.  (Original) The biggest adrenaline rush at America's Roller Coast yet! While I'm glad that the woman involved in the accident is doing alright, I just hope CP gets Dragster back up and running next year with some serious upgrades to the launch system, queue line, and track modifications because it just wouldn't be the same without it.

topComments.author: Sasha Swan
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) S√≥ estava aberto no domingo. Estava fechado sexta e s√°bado. A subida em si tem 17 segundos de dura√ß√£o. O chute √© no come√ßo, na subida, e a descida √© f√°cil.  Longas filas. Por causa do vento, os carrinhos podem ficar cheios menos da metade, criando linhas muito lentas. O passe da Fast Lane era a chave aqui. Voc√™ pode gastar mais de uma hora e meia de outra forma. Minha espera foi de 30 minutos na primeira vez e 20 minutos na segunda.  (Original) Was only open on Sunday. Was closed Friday and Saturday. The rise itself is 17 sec long. The kick is at the beginning, on the way up, and the way down is easy.  Long lines. Because of the wind, carts might be filled less than half way making very slow lines. Fast Lane pass was key here. You can spend over an hour and a half otherwise. My wait was 30 min the first time and 20 the second.

topComments.author: Matt Clarke

J√° montei esse brinquedo dezenas de vezes ao longo dos anos e esperei horas na fila quando ele foi inaugurado. Sempre fico ansioso para pedalar quando visitar o parque, o que irei fazer na pr√≥xima semana, ent√£o estou super animado. Este √© um dos muitos passeios incr√≠veis no parque que voc√™ deve navegar.  (Original) This is one of the tallest, fastest, most exciting roller coasters in the world. I have riden this ride dozens of times over the years, and waited for hours in line when it first opened. I always look forward to riding this when I visit the park, which I will be doing next week so I am super excited. This is one of the many amazing rides at the park that you should tide.

topComments.author: Tracey H.

I've always been afraid to ride it, but it's been a very popular attraction for parkgoers.

Must be a real thrill seeker for this ride!

topComments.author: e l
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) A ponta do cedro √© sempre √≥tima, cheguei aqui √†s 9 e a fila n√£o era muito longa. Algu√©m morreu no dragster ontem enquanto esperava na fila. topComments.author: anonymous user

topComments.author: ƒ¢ƒ±√∏ ƒ™ƒ™
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Greattttt Ride....um dos meus favoritos no parque...mesmo que o passeio s√≥ dura cerca de 19 ou 20 segundos.. 0-120mph em 3 ou 3,5 segundos, e o dragster tem 420 p√©s de altura. Esta montanha-russa teve muitos problemas ao longo dos anos e parece ser um filho da arma para manter. Toda vez que visito o parque, parece que o Top Thrill Dragster est√° fechado para manuten√ß√£o, seja uma hora ou o dia todo...  (Original) Greatttttt Ride....one of my favorites in the park...eventhough the ride only lasts about 19 or 20 seconds.. 0-120mph in 3 or 3.5 seconds, and the dragster is 420ft tall. This coaster has had alottttt of problems over the years and seems to be a son of a gun to maintain. Everytime I visit the park, it seems that the Top Thrill Dragster is closed for maintaince, whether that is an hour, or all day....never fails...

topComments.author: Eric Haffner
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Sim, est√° fechado em 2022. Sim, o passeio dura apenas 17 segundos. Sim, voc√™ vai 120 MPH em menos de 5 segundos. Sim, espero que abra novamente em breve. Sim, v√° ao banheiro antes do passeio.  (Original) Yes, it is closed in 2022. Yes, the ride lasts only 17 seconds. Yes, you go 120 MPH in less than 5 seconds. Yes, I hope it opens back up soon. Yes, go to the bathroom before the ride.

topComments.author: Albert Collins
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Os 60 segundos mais emocionantes da sua vida podem ser desfrutados no Top Thrill Dragster. Ser disparado de uma parada para 120 mph √© indescrit√≠vel. Voc√™ dispara t√£o r√°pido que ter√° de agarrar a m√°scara para evitar que saia do rosto. Voc√™ viajar√° a 420 p√©s no c√©u, onde far√° uma bela volta lenta por cima, dando-lhe tempo suficiente para ver por quil√¥metros em todas as dire√ß√µes e sentir um pequeno suspiro de alegria antes de cair de volta a 120 metros para cruzar a linha de chegada. Atualiza√ß√£o da Covid :. Voc√™ precisar√° de um passe de acesso para pilotar o Top Thrill Dragster. V√° para a entrada do passeio assim que entrar no parque para o seu passe e tempo de passeio. Os passes variam de abertos at√© 16h. Uma segunda rodada de passes √© entregue √†s 15h30 para hor√°rios de passeio at√© o fechamento do parque.  (Original) The most exhilarating 60 seconds of your life can be had on Top Thrill Dragster.  Being rocketed from a stand still to 120mph is indescribable.  You fire off so fast that you will have to grab your mask to prevent it from leaving your face.  You will travel 420 ft into the sky where you make a nice slow round over the top, giving you enough time to see for miles in all directions and experience a little gasp of joy before plummeting back down 400 ft to cross the finish line. Covid Update:. You will need an access pass to ride Top Thrill Dragster.  Go to the entrance of the ride as soon as you enter the park for your ride pass and time.  Passes range from open until 4pm.  A second round of passes are handed out at 3:30pm for ride times until park closure.

topComments.author: Ami Hull
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este √© o melhor coaster ever !! Eu nunca tinha estado em um passeio como este. √â como se voc√™ fosse uma bala sendo baleada! A for√ßa deste passeio desde o in√≠cio √© intensa e emocionante! Sabendo que voc√™ pode ou n√£o faz√™-lo todo o caminho at√© o topo √© emocionante. A espera foi longa e eles ainda fechou o passeio para baixo para uma verifica√ß√£o de seguran√ßa, mas n√≥s ainda esperamos. N√£o foi a pior linha embora, esperamos 45 minutos, mas t√£o feliz que fizemos! Vale a espera!  (Original) This is the best coaster ever!! I had never been on a ride like this. It's like you're a bullet being shot! The force of this ride right from the beginning is intense and thrilling! Knowing you may or may not make it the whole way to the top is exciting. The wait was long and they even closed the ride down for a safety check but we still waited. It wasn't the worst line though, we waited 45 minutes but so glad we did! Well worth the wait!
